Title: Mariathasan2018_PDL1_treatment
Description: Processed RNA-seq data, quantified as counts and TPM, for bladder cancer samples pre anti-PDL1 immunotherapy. Information on patient's tumor mutational burden and response to anti-PD1 treatment is also provided. Represented as a SummarizedExperiment; derived from IMvigor210CoreBiologies R package (Mariathasan et al., Nature, 2018) under the CC-BY license.
DataProvider: Mariathasan S, Turley S, Nickles D et al., â€œTGF-b attenuates tumor response to PD-L1 blockade by contributing to exclusion of T cells.
